preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 56 g of Rb2S8 and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 28 g of silicon (Si) to the container. 
 3. Add 14 g of samarium (Sm2). 
 4. Use a ceramic spatula to mix the ingredients thoroughly for 10 minutes, ensuring an even distribution.
